skill.name: Wave of Light
skill.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Focus a wave of light that crushes enemies for 835% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Ring a mystic bell that crushes enemies.

rune.name: Explosive Light
rune.description: Release bursts of energy that deal 830% weapon damage as Fire to nearby enemies.
rune.simpleDescription: Release bursts of energy that deal Fire damage to enemies.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Radiance
rune.description:
Gain 15% increased attack speed for 4 seconds after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Fire.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain increased attack speed after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Fire.

skill.name: Blinding Flash
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Create a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 3 seconds. Elite enemies recover faster, but suffer a 30% chance to miss with attacks.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Blind all nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

rune.name: Faith in the Light
rune.description: You deal 29% increased damage for 3 seconds after using Blinding Flash.
rune.simpleDescription: You deal increased damage for a short duration after using Blinding Flash.

skill.name: Sweeping Wind
skill.description:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex that continuously deals 105% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards. The vortex lasts 6 seconds and is refreshed each time you strike an enemy with a melee attack. Landing a Critical Hit has a chance to increase the vortex effect up to 3 stacks for a total of 315% weapon damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Spirit

Surround yourself in a vortex for 6 seconds that damages nearby enemies. Critical Hits intensify the vortex.

rune.name: Inner Storm
rune.description:
As long as your vortex is at 3 or more stacks, you gain 8 Spirit per second.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Holy.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain Spirit whenever the vortex is at 3 or more stacks.

Sweeping Wind's damage turns into Holy.

skill.name: Mystic Ally
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Active: Your mystic ally has its damage increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side. The ally deals 130% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing. When the ally dies, it is reborn after 5 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Active: Your mystic ally has its damage increased for a short duration.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side.

rune.name: Air Ally
rune.description:
Active: You gain 100 Spirit.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side that increases your Spirit Regeneration by 4.
rune.simpleDescription:
Active: You gain a burst of Spirit.

Passive: A mystic ally fights by your side that increases your Spirit Regeneration.

skill.name: Mantra of Conviction
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Damage bonus is increased to 16% for 3 seconds.

Passive: Enemies within 30 yards of you take 8% increased damage.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Damage bonus is increased for a short duration.

Passive: Nearby enemies take increased damage.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Annihilation
rune.description: Passive: Killing an enemy that is affected by Mantra of Conviction grants you and your allies 30% increased movement speed for 3 seconds.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Killing an enemy that is affected by Mantra of Conviction grants you and your allies increased movement speed for a short duration.

skill.name: Harmony
skill.description: 40% of your single elemental resistances from items instead increases your resistance to all elements.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

skill.name: Beacon of Ytar
skill.description: Reduce all cooldowns by 20%.
skill.flavor: It is only through hardship that we come to know our limits, and only through knowing our limits that we learn to shatter them.

skill.name: Seize the Initiative
skill.description: Dealing damage to enemies above 75% Life increases your attack speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
skill.flavor: The Monks of Ivgorod are trained to move like water â€” flowing freely into open spaces and crashing hard against their foes.

skill.name: Momentum
skill.description: Moving 25 yards increases your damage by 20% for 6 seconds.
skill.flavor: Always in motion, flowing like water.

mainHand.name: Incense Torch of the Grand Temple

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193112 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 6437 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.

skill.name: Poison Bolts
skill.description:
Cooldown: 3 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 320% weapon damage and an additional 100% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 3 seconds

Shoots a deadly poisoned bolt.

skill.name: Dirty Fighting
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel.

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 310% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 10 yards and has a 100% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Deals damage in an area that has a chance to Stun enemies.

skill.name: Anatomy
skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1.8% for you and the Scoundrel.
skill.simpleDescription: Increases Critical Hit Chance for you and the Scoundrel.

mainHand.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Charm
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Temporarily Charms an enemy to fight for you.

skill.name: Missile Ward
skill.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, reducing damage from ranged attacks by 6%.
skill.simpleDescription: Reduces damage from ranged attacks for you and the Enchantress.

skill.name: Erosion
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals 330% weapon damage as Arcane over 5 seconds. Affected enemies will also take 3% increased damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals damage and causes affected enemies to take additional damage.

skill.name: Focused Mind
skill.description: A 40 yard aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress by 3%.
skill.simpleDescription: An aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress.
